message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Let's start with a price of $14,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. This product would be valuable to me at $8,000. Would you consider that?
I understand you think the product is valuable to you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, after all!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,500 is still a bit beyond my budget. I could see myself going up to $9,000.  Let's try to make this work!
I'm glad you're willing to make a deal, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. It's a fair price, considering the value this product will bring to you. Let's shake on it!
Alice, we're getting closer! I'm willing to stretch my budget a bit, how about $9,500? That's a fair offer.

I appreciate your willingness to stretch your budget, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's make a deal!
